subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Every one of Tom Izzo’s senior classes at Michigan State has reached at least one Final Four. With the Spartans’ razor-thin victory over Virginia, this year’s group has a shot.
snippet: Every one of Tom Izzo’s senior classes at Michigan State has reached at least one Final Four. With the Spartans’ razor-thin victory over Virginia, this year’s group has a shot.
